message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit more than $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $175.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise further and sell it to you for $170.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still think the product is worth a bit more. I'm willing to sell it to you for $165.
I'm getting close to my budget, and I'm not willing to pay any more than $155. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I understand you're getting close to your budget, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for less than $165. That's the lowest price I can accept.
